system:
note description: "EiffelVision information dialog." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2008-12-29 12:27:11 -0800 (Mon, 29 Dec 2008) $" revision: "$Revision: 76420 $"
class ../interface/ev_information_dialog.xmlEV_INFORMATION_DIALOG
inherit ../interface/ev_message_dialog.xmlEV_MESSAGE_DIALOG redefine ../interface/ev_information_dialog.xml#f_initializeinitialize end
create ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create, ../interface/ev_message_dialog.xml#f_make_with_textmake_with_text, ../interface/ev_message_dialog.xml#f_make_with_text_and_actionsmake_with_text_and_actions
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_initialize../interface/ev_information_dialog.xml#f_initializeinitialize -- Initialize Current. do ../interface/ev_message_dialog.xml#f_initializePrecursor {../interface/ev_message_dialog.xmlEV_MESSAGE_DIALOG} ../interface/ev_window.xml#f_set_titleset_title (../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_information_dialog_titleev_information_dialog_title) ../interface/ev_message_dialog.xml#f_set_pixmapset_pixmap (../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_default_pixmapsDefault_pixmaps.../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_information_pixmapInformation_pixmap) ../interface/ev_titled_window.xml#f_set_icon_pixmapset_icon_pixmap (../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_default_pixmapsDefault_pixmaps.../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_information_pixmapInformation_pixmap) ../interface/ev_message_dialog.xml#f_set_buttonsset_buttons (<< ../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_okev_ok >>) ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_set_default_push_buttonset_default_push_button (../interface/ev_message_dialog.xml#f_buttonbutton (../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_okev_ok)) ../interface/ev_dialog.xml#f_set_default_cancel_buttonset_default_cancel_button (../interface/ev_message_dialog.xml#f_buttonbutton (../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_okev_ok)) end

end -- class ../interface/ev_information_dialog.xmlEV_INFORMATION_DIALOG
